data.text: La Piscina Dubai such  an amazing place to chill by the pool at Versace Hotel,  we had  some drinks and bites. So beautiful peaceful area, cabanas, sun beds available . Want to thank the staff specially  Wilson he took care of our great experience
data.title: Wow wow

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear anamariabE8518SM,

Thank you for taking the time to write such a complimentary review of your recent visit to La Psicina.
It was a pleasure to have you as our guests and I was happy to know that Wilson assisted you so well. 
We greatly value such positive comments from our guests and appreciate you taking the time to share it with us. 
The team and I hope to see you again soon.

Kind regards,
Mansour Memarian
Hotel Manager
owner_response.author: Palazzo Versace Dubai

data.text: This hotel really nice and people also kindness, Titan is the gays who responsible for my room, he clear very carefully and give chocolate to me very nice man, attitude very nice üòä I would like to come here next business trip, just because the nice service and beautiful room, the food also vey dilicious, I like it üëç
data.title: Good experience

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear 104bellaf,

Thank you for taking the time to write a review on TripAdvisor following your recent stay at Palazzo Versace Dubai.
I was delighted that you had an enjoyable stay and that the team, especially Titan looked after you well. 
Your kind comments are greatly valued and will be shared with the rest of the team.

We look forward to welcoming you again soon.

Kind regards,
Mansour Memarian
Hotel Manager
owner_response.author: Palazzo Versace Dubai

data.text:
We booked 5 days here this month booked 916 it's a huge duit room  wow wow wow , on arrival we had drinks at reception , our room as covered in petals bath was run full of bubbles , and a heart of petals on our huge bed, the room was just breathtaking , faultless , staff were attentive food first class , we back in December visiting our daughter again , great location to everything , looking forward to staying again in December , can't thank you all for such a wonderful stay 
Captain Gary John's and Mrs Sharon johns xxx
data.title: Suit 916 with outstanding city views across Dubai night sky

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Captain Gary and Mrs. Sharon Johns,

Thank you for taking the time to share such great feedback about your recent stay with us at Palazzo Versace Dubai. 
I was delighted to know that you enjoyed all aspects of your stay. Your kind comments are appreciated and will surely be shared with the rest of the team. 

Our guest‚Äôs complete satisfaction is our main aim at Palazzo Versace Dubai and it is very rewarding for us to know this was achieved during your stay with us. I look forward to the pleasure of welcoming you and your family back in December. 

Kind regards,
Mansour Memarian
Hotel Manager
owner_response.author: Palazzo Versace Dubai

data.text: I had a lovely time at the pool of Palazzo Versace. The food was delicious and the staff provided exceptional service. I had the chance to try their avocado and prawns bruschetta and I have to admit that it was delicious. Highly recommended to everyone!
data.title: Lovely experience

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:

I was delighted that you thoroughly enjoyed your time at the pool and were pleased with the exceptional service and quality of food and drinks served.

Your kind comments are greatly valued and will be shared with the rest of the team.

Kind regards,
Mansour Memarian

data.text:
Checkin was welcoming, my birthday vacation stay was amazing! Especially with the help is Anastasiia who helped craft my vacation stay and assisted me greatly in the setback I had with my missed flight which almost cost me a day of my booking. 
Thanks to Anastasia and the rest of the stafff of the hotel, my stay was worth every bit. 
From cleanliness, to food, to ambience, it‚Äôs amazing.
data.title: An extremely relaxing stay in beauty, calm and luxury

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear rhemao2024,

Thank you for choosing Palazzo Versace Dubai to celebrate such a special occasion and for taking the time to share such an amazing feedback following your stay. 

It was a pleasure to read your review and to know, in such few words, how much you enjoyed staying at our hotel. I was particularly delighted to know that you were impressed with the genuine and attentive service you received from Anastasia and the team. 

We always strive to exceed our guests‚Äô expectations and it‚Äôs pleasing to know that we succeeded on this occasion.
The team and I hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back to the hotel in the near future.

Kind regards,
Mansour Memarian
Hotel Manager
